name: Town of Tinysville
description:
You have recently become mayor of Tinysville. Your goal is to make your town as wealthy as possible before running out of resources... or land! You must strategically place down different buildings to follow their requirements.

Once you are done. click finish and take a screenshot of your town!

(All programming, art, and music were made by 7SevenStudios in 48 hours for the DJAM6)
